title: Milk outside a bag of milk outside a bag of milk Download
description:
(How do you feel?) Tasty Planet – I definitely feel. Sometimes that’s more than enough. (Still, you’re anxious, aren’t you?) – Of course. Moreover, I’m completely terrified . Was it that obvious? (You’re looking in every direction, but not up.) – Ah, this – I’ve already told you, haven’t I? (About what?) – Ah, you know, small stuff. (Can small stuff make you terrified?) – It’s hard to explain. I climb up the metal railing and let my legs hang down. I sneak short glances at the abyss from time to time. It replies with angry, cold breath. That’s how we interact. Like old friends. – Sometimes I feel like the whole world pretends to be crazy. – As if it’s trying to make me believe in something that doesn’t exist. (That’s weird, isn’t it?)
The game is a sequel to Milk inside a bag of milk inside a bag of milk . The game’s events begin the same moment the first game ends.
